/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is lined with tall trees, their leaves a vibrant green, standing like sentinels on either side of the road. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, a bridge arches over the road, adding a touch of architectural interest to the natural landscape. The image is bathed in natural daylight, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
